>Talon:
> 
>"Report at my location and we can start to secire the 
>area" said talon

"Understood." Legacy intoned from his aerial position, his voice cold and unfeeling over the transmission lines. 

Above the old Maximal base the military satellite that was Legacy shifted and contorted as it changed forms, the sound of gears moving together could be heard as it quickly assumed its armored robotic mode. Boosters flare for a moment allowing Legacy to touch down and look around, his single optic shifted colors then resuming its typical crimson glow. 

Turning his rather bulky form Legacy quickly made his way to Talon's position, "I see no evidence of an attack in progress, although there are residual energy patterns here." Legacy turned his cold gaze on talon, "Where are the minions?"

(OOC: I am not sure where the other Maximals are, or where Talon is in relation to all of this, so I was somewhat vague. This should open to anyone that is in the area I would guess??) 

Preston
(Legacy)
